- Fill out the following repro template

If it's not a bug, please remove the template and elaborate the issue in your own words.
-->
## Steps to reproduce

On Windows

```
PS> throw ("1234567890"*([Console]::BufferWidth/10 + 10))
```

then with the mouse, select the text of the error message, paste on something like notepad
## Expected behavior

no unnecessary line breaks
## Actual behavior

line breaks at the buffer width
## Environment data

Win10 any version

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body:
If I insert clipboard in Notepad after `$error[0].Exception.Message | clip` I don't see any extra newlines.
@lzybkr Please clarify that we should fix.

comments.author: lzybkr
comments.body:
You're trying something other than what the repro steps say - and in this case, you will see different behavior.

Do follow my repro steps exactly (including running on Win10).

title: We shouldn't add explicit newlines when writing errors
